item.title: Problem with the display of the message when you click on an object (SOLVED)
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

if ((objectID == 1725) && (objectX == 2732) && (objectY == 3377)) { if (playerHasItem(1546)) toX = 2725; toY = 3380; heightLevel = 0; sM("You need a blue key."); }

The problem with this is that you are only checking that the player has the item to teleport him to the X, then continuing to send them the message anyway.

if ((objectID == 1725) && (objectX == 2732) && (objectY == 3377)) { if (playerHasItem(1546)) { toX = 2725; toY = 3380; heightLevel = 0; } sM("You need a blue key."); }

If you did it like this, you would be checking if they had the key to enter the staircase, however you would still send the message because you’re not telling it to stop before sending the message.

if ((objectID == 1725) && (objectX == 2732) && (objectY == 3377)) { if (playerHasItem(1546)) { toX = 2725; toY = 3380; heightLevel = 0; } else { sM("You need a blue key."); } }

This code works because it checks if the player has the key, then sends him up the stairs. If the player doesnt have the key(the else statement), then it sends them a message telling him that.

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with the display of the message when you click on an object (SOLVED)

item.title: Problem with the display of the message when you click on an object (SOLVED)
item.dc:creator: @artyr artyr
item.description:
@artyr wrote:

Hello!
I need help, please anyone help me with this.
Delta Base, DeltaScape 317

I make stairscase/entrance cave with key.
in client.java

for Entrance cave
}
if(objectID == 2808){
if (playerHasItem(76))
toX = 2559;
toY = 3060;
heightLevel = 0;
sM(“You need a khazard key.”);
break;
}
message when i dont have a key.
[spoiler]
2mmbzo0.jpg764×497
[/spoiler]
message when i have already key and go teled, but again this message come.
[spoiler]
2571ymo.jpg759×497
[/spoiler]

for staircase i got
}
if ((objectID == 1725) && (objectX == 2732) && (objectY == 3377)) {
if (playerHasItem(1546))
toX = 2725;
toY = 3380;
heightLevel = 0;
sM(“You need a blue key.”);
}
message when i dont have a key.
[spoiler]

2le3pc2.jpg760×499
[/spoiler]
message when i have already key and got teled, but again this message come.
[spoiler]
250ntap.jpg763×499
[/spoiler]
The message should be displayed when I dont have key, but but this message displayed, even when I have the key.

Read full topic
